text: The Shepherd Girl (Persian: Dokhtare choopan) is a 1953 Iranian drama film directed by Moezzodivan Fekri.Issari p.272 ==Partial cast== * Moezzodivan Fekri * Majid Mohseni * Taghi Zohuri == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. title: The Shepherd Girl
